portfolio.title: Personalized Fashion Assistant
portfolio.description: Innovative personalized fashion assistant enabling virtual try-on, expert ratings, and fit advice for women's tops, enhancing online shopping.

portfolio.title: Movie Genre Prediction
portfolio.description: Exploring genre classification for movies using NLP and ML techniques, leveraging plots, titles, and tags through BiLSTM modeling.

portfolio.title: Campus Crib, Housing Made Easy!!
portfolio.description: Designed interactive housing search platform with Django, elevating UF student housing matches by 25% and boosting satisfaction.

portfolio.title: Twitter Engine Clone
portfolio.description: Built fault-tolerant Twitter replica in Erlang, highlighting concurrent processing, serving 10,000+ users while ensuring stability.

portfolio.title: E-commerce Replica Development
portfolio.description: Created a feature-rich MERN e-commerce clone mimicking Flipkart, achieving 90% feature match and enhancing user engagement by 50% through responsive design.

portfolio.title: Helmet Detection of Bike Riders
portfolio.description: Enhanced YOLOv3 model to detect helmet usage during bike rides by fine-tuning on 1500 annotated images, achieving accurate real-time predictions for rider safety.
